main.mainSliderTitle1: My Blogs are welcome to everyone.
main.mainSliderTitle2: My Blogs are a comfort to you who are tired in a day.
main.mainSliderTitle3: My Blogs will immediately banish the author of the application and advertisement without any purpose.
main.mainSliderTitle4: My Blogs sincerely wish you a happy day.
main.mainSliderDescription1: Use it as if you came to your comfortable house.
main.mainSliderDescription2: I want you to be considerate of others.
main.mainSliderDescription3: If you write for advertising, slander, swearing, or illegal purposes, you will be deported permanently.
